title: Desperately Horny Housewives
overview: Middle View Heights has more than its share of Desperately Horny Housewives. These normally prim and proper housewives step outside their ecumenical lives and trade in tea and scones for cock and sperm. Pampered, perfumed and amorous as hell, they are easy prey for the men of Middle View Heights. Or are the men easy prey for the housewives? Find out for yourself, provided you can stand the heat!
